headline: WTW appoints Han Wei Fong as new Country Leader for Singapore
summary: SINGAPORE, Feb. 25, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- WTW (NASDAQ: WTW), a leading global advisory, broking and solutions company, today announced the appointment of Han Wei Fong as Country Leader for Singapore, effective 1 March 2026. Han Wei will hold dual capacity, continuing his current position as Head of Health & Benefits, Singapore, alongside his new country leadership responsibilities. Han Wei joined WTW in September last year and brings deep industry experience in health and benefits consulting

content.title: WTW appoints Han Wei Fong as new Country Leader for Singapore
content.summary: SINGAPORE, Feb. 25, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- WTW (NASDAQ: WTW), a leading global advisory, broking and solutions company, today announced the appointment of Han Wei Fong as Country Leader for Singapore, effective 1 March 2026. Han Wei will hold dual capacity, continuing his current position as Head of Health & Benefits, Singapore, alongside his new country leadership responsibilities. Han Wei joined WTW in September last year and brings deep industry experience in health and benefits consulting
